resources.string: Private key below can be used to spend money from the bitcoin address above. Write it down and keep in safe place, then generate another address to clean it.
Unable to generate a key, sorry.

Now you can spend some coins from %1$s. To do this you need to paste hex-encoded raw transaction which have unspent outputs for the address: first using blockexplorer.com or blockchain.info go to the address details and find hash of the transaction. Then get the raw transaction in bitcoin-qt using getrawtransaction [hash] command and send it to phone. (You may need to start bitcoin-qt from command line with \'-txindex 1\' for that).

Transaction below will transfer %1$s BTC from %2$s to %3$s. Transaction fee is %4$s. You can push it with sendrawtransaction bitcoin-qt command. And again, I have no responsibility if something will go wrong. The app was carefully tested and transaction was verified, but no one can give any warranties that it is bug-free, so use it on your own risk and verify tx\'s output carefully before pushing it.
